name: DeleteCustomer
description:
Delete a customer and all associated information.

This tool deletes a customer and their information from Customer.io. It should be called when you want to completely remove a customer from the database. Note: After deletion, customers may be accidentally recreated if new data is sent through other means.

parameters.name: customer_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a person, which can be an ID, email, or 'cio_id'. Use 'cio_' prefix for 'cio_id'.

value_schema.description: The unique value representing a person. The values you use to identify a person may be an `id`, `email` address, or the `cio_id` (when updating people), depending on your workspace settings. When you reference people by `cio_id`, you must prefix the value with `cio_`.
